message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product I know you'll find valuable.  Given its potential, I'm initially suggesting a price of $1,700,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,500,000. I'm very interested in the product, but I need to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand your position.  While the product is incredibly valuable, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we agree on $1,600,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,550,000. I'm still very interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
